ApproveSkill.name: ApproveSkill
ApproveSkill.description:
Grants permission to associate a skill with the organization under the customer's
                                                AWS account

AssociateContactWithAddressBook.description: Grants permission to associate a contact with a given address book

AssociateDeviceWithNetworkProfile.description: Grants permission to associate a device with the specified network profile

AssociateDeviceWithRoom.name: AssociateDeviceWithRoom
AssociateDeviceWithRoom.description: Grants permission to associate device with given room

AssociateSkillGroupWithRoom.description: Grants permission to associate the skill group with given room

AssociateSkillWithSkillGroup.description: Grants permission to associate a skill with a skill group

AssociateSkillWithUsers.name: AssociateSkillWithUsers
AssociateSkillWithUsers.description:
Grants permission to make a private skill available for enrolled users to enable on
                                                their devices

CompleteRegistration.name: CompleteRegistration
CompleteRegistration.description: Grants permission to complete the operation of registering an Alexa device

CreateAddressBook.name: CreateAddressBook
CreateAddressBook.description: Grants permission to create an address book with the specified details

CreateBusinessReportSchedule.name: CreateBusinessReportSchedule
CreateBusinessReportSchedule.description:
Grants permission to create a recurring schedule for usage reports to deliver to the
                                                specified S3 location with a specified daily or weekly interval

CreateConferenceProvider.name: CreateConferenceProvider
CreateConferenceProvider.description: Grants permission to add a new conference provider under the user's AWS account

CreateContact.name: CreateContact
CreateContact.description: Grants permission to create a contact with the specified details

CreateGatewayGroup.name: CreateGatewayGroup
CreateGatewayGroup.description: Grants permission to create a gateway group with the specified details

CreateNetworkProfile.name: CreateNetworkProfile
CreateNetworkProfile.description: Grants permission to create a network profile with the specified details

CreateProfile.description: Grants permission to create a new profile

CreateRoom.name: CreateRoom
CreateRoom.description: Grants permission to create room with the specified details

CreateSkillGroup.name: CreateSkillGroup
CreateSkillGroup.description: Grants permission to create a skill group with given name and description

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.description: Grants permission to create a user

DeleteAddressBook.name: DeleteAddressBook
DeleteAddressBook.description: Grants permission to delete an address book by the address book ARN

DeleteBusinessReportSchedule.description:
Grants permission to delete the recurring report delivery schedule with the specified
                                                schedule ARN

DeleteConferenceProvider.description: Grants permission to delete a conference provider

DeleteContact.name: DeleteContact
DeleteContact.description: Grants permission to delete a contact by the contact ARN

DeleteDevice.name: DeleteDevice
DeleteDevice.description: Grants permission to remove a device from Alexa For Business

DeleteDeviceUsageData.description:
Grants permission to delete the device's entire previous history of voice input data
                                                and associated response data

DeleteGatewayGroup.name: DeleteGatewayGroup
DeleteGatewayGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a gateway group

DeleteNetworkProfile.name: DeleteNetworkProfile
DeleteNetworkProfile.description: Grants permission to delete a network profile by the network profile ARN

DeleteProfile.name: DeleteProfile
DeleteProfile.description: Grants permission to delete profile by profile ARN

DeleteRoomSkillParameter.name: DeleteRoomSkillParameter
DeleteRoomSkillParameter.description: Grants permission to delete a parameter from a skill and room

DeleteSkillAuthorization.name: DeleteSkillAuthorization
DeleteSkillAuthorization.description: Grants permission to unlink a third-party account from a skill

DeleteSkillGroup.name: DeleteSkillGroup
DeleteSkillGroup.description: Grants permission to delete skill group with skill group ARN

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete a user

DisassociateContactFromAddressBook.description: Grants permission to disassociate a contact from a given address book

DisassociateDeviceFromRoom.description: Grants permission to disassociate device from its current room

DisassociateSkillFromSkillGroup.name: DisassociateSkillFromSkillGroup
DisassociateSkillFromSkillGroup.description: Grants permission to disassociate a skill from a skill group

DisassociateSkillFromUsers.description:
Grants permission to make a private skill unavailable for enrolled users and prevent
                                                them from enabling it on their devices

DisassociateSkillGroupFromRoom.description: Grants permission to disassociate the skill group from given room

ForgetSmartHomeAppliances.description: Grants permission to forget smart home appliances associated to a room

GetAddressBook.description: Grants permission to get the address book details by the address book ARN

GetConferencePreference.name: GetConferencePreference
GetConferencePreference.description: Grants permission to retrieve the existing conference preferences

GetConferenceProvider.name: GetConferenceProvider
GetConferenceProvider.description: Grants permission to get details about a specific conference provider

GetContact.name: GetContact
GetContact.description: Grants permission to get the contact details by the contact ARN

GetDevice.name: GetDevice
GetDevice.description: Grants permission to get device details

GetGateway.name: GetGateway
GetGateway.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of a gateway

GetGatewayGroup.name: GetGatewayGroup
GetGatewayGroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of a gateway group

Grants permission to retrieve the configured values for the user enrollment invitation

GetNetworkProfile.name: GetNetworkProfile
GetNetworkProfile.description: Grants permission to get the network profile details by the network profile ARN

GetProfile.name: GetProfile
GetProfile.description: Grants permission to get profile when provided with Profile ARN

GetRoom.name: GetRoom
GetRoom.description: Grants permission to get room details

GetRoomSkillParameter.description: Grants permission to get an existing parameter that has been set for a skill and room

GetSkillGroup.name: GetSkillGroup
GetSkillGroup.description: Grants permission to get skill group details with skill group ARN

ListBusinessReportSchedules.description: Grants permission to list the details of the schedules that a user configured

ListConferenceProviders.name: ListConferenceProviders
ListConferenceProviders.description: Grants permission to list conference providers under a specific AWS account

ListDeviceEvents.description:
Grants permission to list the device event history, including device connection status,
                                                for up to 30 days

ListGatewayGroups.name: ListGatewayGroups
ListGatewayGroups.description: Grants permission to list gateway group summaries

ListGateways.name: ListGateways
ListGateways.description: Grants permission to list gateway summaries

ListSkillsStoreCategories.description: Grants permission to list all categories in the Alexa skill store

ListSkillsStoreSkillsByCategory.name: ListSkillsStoreSkillsByCategory
ListSkillsStoreSkillsByCategory.description: Grants permission to list all skills in the Alexa skill store by category

ListSmartHomeAppliances.name: ListSmartHomeAppliances
ListSmartHomeAppliances.description: Grants permission to list all of the smart home appliances associated with a room

ListTags.name: ListTags
ListTags.description: Grants permission to list all tags on a resource

PutConferencePreference.name: PutConferencePreference
PutConferencePreference.description:
Grants permission to set the conference preferences on a specific conference provider
                                                at the account level

PutDeviceSetupEvents.name: PutDeviceSetupEvents
PutDeviceSetupEvents.description: Grants permission to publish Alexa device setup events

PutInvitationConfiguration.name: PutInvitationConfiguration
PutInvitationConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to configure the email template for the user enrollment invitation
                                                with the specified attributes

PutRoomSkillParameter.name: PutRoomSkillParameter
PutRoomSkillParameter.description: Grants permission to put a room specific parameter for a skill

PutSkillAuthorization.name: PutSkillAuthorization
PutSkillAuthorization.description: Grants permission to link a user's account to a third-party skill provider

RegisterAVSDevice.description:
Grants permission to register an Alexa-enabled device built by an Original Equipment
                                                Manufacturer (OEM) using Alexa Voice Service (AVS)

RegisterDevice.name: RegisterDevice
RegisterDevice.description: Grants permission to register an Alexa device

RejectSkill.name: RejectSkill
RejectSkill.description:
Grants permission to disassociate a skill from the organization under a user's AWS
                                                account

ResolveRoom.name: ResolveRoom
ResolveRoom.description: Grants permission to resolve room information

RevokeInvitation.name: RevokeInvitation
RevokeInvitation.description: Grants permission to revoke an invitation

SearchAddressBooks.name: SearchAddressBooks
SearchAddressBooks.description:
Grants permission to search address books and list the ones that meet a set of filter
                                                and sort criteria

SearchContacts.name: SearchContacts
SearchContacts.description:
Grants permission to search contacts and list the ones that meet a set of filter and
                                                sort criteria

SearchDevices.name: SearchDevices
SearchDevices.description: Grants permission to search for devices

SearchNetworkProfiles.name: SearchNetworkProfiles
SearchNetworkProfiles.description:
Grants permission to search network profiles and list the ones that meet a set of
                                                filter and sort criteria

SearchProfiles.description: Grants permission to search for profiles

SearchRooms.name: SearchRooms
SearchRooms.description: Grants permission to search for rooms

SearchSkillGroups.name: SearchSkillGroups
SearchSkillGroups.description: Grants permission to search for skill groups

SearchUsers.name: SearchUsers
SearchUsers.description: Grants permission to search for users

SendAnnouncement.name: SendAnnouncement
SendAnnouncement.description:
Grants permission to trigger an asynchronous flow to send text, SSML, or audio announcements
                                                to rooms that are identified by a search or filter

SendInvitation.name: SendInvitation
SendInvitation.description: Grants permission to send an invitation to a user

StartDeviceSync.name: StartDeviceSync
StartDeviceSync.description:
Grants permission to restore the device and its account to its known, default settings
                                                by clearing all information and settings set by its previous users

StartSmartHomeApplianceDiscovery.name: StartSmartHomeApplianceDiscovery
StartSmartHomeApplianceDiscovery.description:
Grants permission to initiate the discovery of any smart home appliances associated
                                                with the room

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add metadata tags to a resource

UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove metadata tags from a resource

UpdateAddressBook.description: Grants permission to update address book details by the address book ARN

UpdateBusinessReportSchedule.description:
Grants permission to update the configuration of the report delivery schedule with
                                                the specified schedule ARN

UpdateConferenceProvider.description: Grants permission to update an existing conference provider's settings

UpdateContact.name: UpdateContact
UpdateContact.description: Grants permission to update the contact details by the contact ARN

UpdateDevice.name: UpdateDevice
UpdateDevice.description: Grants permission to update device name

UpdateGateway.name: UpdateGateway
UpdateGateway.description: Grants permission to update the details of a gateway

UpdateGatewayGroup.name: UpdateGatewayGroup
UpdateGatewayGroup.description: Grants permission to update the details of a gateway group

UpdateNetworkProfile.name: UpdateNetworkProfile
UpdateNetworkProfile.description: Grants permission to update a network profile by the network profile ARN

UpdateProfile.description: Grants permission to update an existing profile

UpdateRoom.name: UpdateRoom
UpdateRoom.description: Grants permission to update room details
